jobDescription:
What It's About

T he Business Applications Group is closely aligned with the business teams and responsible for the key applications to administrate, monitor and analyze Partners Group’s investment programs. The team is responsible for development, customization and on-going enhancement of these applications and related interfaces to best support the global business operations of Partners Group.

This is a global role where the candidate will provide administration, development and support for the document and content management infrastructure as well as act as the last level of escalation for many production support activities. The person will have control over the scope of technical activities, helping to develop best practices, manage knowledge and ensure necessary training of the team

Responsibilities
 Take responsibility of new developments and maintenance of the PG's in-house developed and commercial applications, ensuring their availability and reliability  Experience with application integration  Gather requirements and interact with end-users to understand their needs  Design solutions, prepare specifications and manage projects together with external developers  Documentation of systems and processes and handover to the Services Team 
What We Expect
 2+ years of experience in software engineering  Experienced in programming languages like Java and Python  Experienced with markup languages, especially XML/XSLT and JSON.  Good level of competency in relational databases (SQL scripting and modeling)  Accurate, effective and independent working style  High level of flexibility, the ability to work under pressure as well as good language skills in English (written/oral)  Excellent communicator with a team-oriented approach  Good project management and personal organization skills  Agile or similar development methodology experience  Solid academic record and a Bachelor/Masters degree with emphasis in technology (e.g. Information Technology, Management Information Systems, Computer Science, etc.) 
Not Required But a Plus
 Financial industry experience  Experience with content management services (Alfresco, SharePoint)  Experience with cloud services (i.e. AWS or Azure)  Knowledge of ETL tools like Pentaho and scheduling tools like Control-M 
What We Offer
 A highly collaborative and entrepreneurial environment in a team that works closely with both the technology and business sides the firm  Opportunity to learn the business from some of the world's leading private market experts  Challenging career path with a long-term career potential  Competitive salary with performance-related compensation model

 Over 3 years of Python scripting, use of NumPy, Pandas and/ or scikit-learn  Nice to have experience in Data Science, Analytics  Data visualization tools expertince with Tableau, Power BI or packages in Python or Javascript  Experience with RDBMS such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MS SQL Server

Dell’s is one of the best run supply chains in the world - renowned for its efficiency and speed of execution. Dell pioneered the Dell Direct Model enabled by a supply chain that generated significant cost and speed efficiencies. Over the last few years, Dell has enabled numerous other sales channels including retail and manufacturing with partner ODMs. The Dell SC is getting transformed with multiple modes of manufacturing and fulfillment to service demands from different customer segments.

GPP Nerve Center is at the heart of Dell’s Global Supply Chain Operations enabling and monitoring the execution of end to end supply chain on a daily basis. Nerve Center is responsible for planning and governance of key areas like weekly and quarterly shipments, backlog levels, Customer experience metrics, etc and monitoring and analysis of all key supply chain metrics ranging from demand planning to customer delivery. The key objective is to help Dell’s global operations to streamline processes, cut costs and improve efficiencies. The team has a very strong pool of talent coming from premier schools and industries and possesses diverse expertise and skill sets.

As part of the Performance Enhance (PE) team, key responsibilities:
Drive daily actions in-order to meet strategic supply chain KPIsPartner with cross-functional teams globally (Factory, Engineering, Procurement, IT, demand planning and logistics) to deliver supply chain resultsRaise visibility against supply chain health with the right level of detail and drive actionsBuild capabilities to look around corners for potential supply chain disruption through analysis and able to recommend solutionsDeliver high quality executive reporting – daily, weekly, monthly, quarterlySupport digital transformation efforts from backend involving application development and implementationAdapt projects, programs or methods based on customer or business partner feedbackPromote, deploy, and share innovative ideas, towards continual improvement

Requirements:
Masters/Bachelors in Supply Chain2-5+ years relevant experienceBasic operational knowledge to drive day to day supply chain activities/reportingExcellent Microsoft excel skills – rating 8+/10Good data management and use of digital tools/applicationsStrong eye for details, analytical and comfortable in working with numbers to develop applications.Good articulation / communication (written and verbal) and presentation skillsPositive attitude, self-starter and team player is must with strong desire to learnPossess strong coding knowledge for .Net Programming, JavaScript (JS), R, Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau

Desired:
Solid knowledge of Database Systems, Data Visualization Tools, Data Modelling Tools, Business Intelligence and Web Development. 

Here’s our story; now tell us yours

Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress.

What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more.

We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today.
